Plot: Two brothers, on either side of the law, face off over organized crime in Brooklyn during the 1970s.
Title: Blood Ties
Writer: Guillaume Canet (screenplay), James Gray (screenplay), Jacques Maillot (film "Les liens du sang"), Pierre Chosson (film "Les liens du sang"), Eric Veniard (film "Les liens du sang"), Bruno Papet (novel), Michel Papet (novel)
Actors: Clive Owen, Billy Crudup, Marion Cotillard, Mila Kunis
